entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
